long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily download and organize LinkedIn search results with the LeadzMachine. This powerful Chrome Extension Tool allows you to download detailed information about people from your LinkedIn search results and save it in CSV or Excel format. Whether you're a recruiter, marketer, or researcher, this tool streamlines your workflow by providing a simple, efficient way to gather and manage LinkedIn data.

Key Features:
•	Effortless Data Management: Quickly download LinkedIn search results, including profiles, contact information, job titles, and more.
•	Customizable Output: Choose CSV  formats to download data and manage  your data management needs.
•	Batch Processing: Export multiple profiles at once to save time and increase productivity.
•	User-Friendly Interface: Simple and intuitive design makes it easy for anyone to use, no technical expertise required.
•	Data Privacy: Your data is securely handled, ensuring privacy and compliance with LinkedIn's terms of service.

How It Works:
•	Go to www.linkedin.com and navigate to People Search.
•	Click the LeadzMachine Chrome Extension Icon, set preferences if needed, and start finding prospects.
•	Download results in CSV or XLSX format.
•	Keep track of the daily limit for prospect email displayed in the top right corner.

Simplify your LinkedIn data management with LeadzMachine and turn your search results into actionable insights effortlessly.
